testcase.name: Generate Token
testcase.system-out: * def authRequestBody = read('classpath:MicroServiceDefinitionLayer/Config/authBody.json') . passed * def headerBody = read('classpath:MicroServiceDefinitionLayer/Config/headerManager.json') . passed * if(env == 'dev') authUrl = 'https://postman-echo.com/basic-auth' ........ passed * if(env == 'test') authUrl = 'https://postman-echo.com/auth/hawk' ........ passed * set headerBody.authHeader.Authorization = 'Basic cG9zdG1hbjpwYXNzd29yZA==' . passed Given url authUrl ......................................................... passed And headers headerBody.authHeader ......................................... passed When method get ........................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed * def token = response.authenticated ...................................... passed * def token_type = 'dummy' ................................................ passed
